name: Global Lithium Resources Limited
description: Global Lithium Resources Limited is a mining and exploration company focused on the development of lithium resources to meet the growing global demand for electric vehicle batteries and renewable energy storage solutions. Founded in 2021, the company is headquartered in Perth, Australia, and is committed to sustainable mining practices and responsible resource management. Global Lithium Resources operates the Manna Lithium Project in Western Australia, which is strategically located near existing infrastructure, enabling efficient project development. The company aims to become a key player in the lithium sector by leveraging advanced mining technologies and adhering to environmental stewardship. As the demand for lithium continues to surge due to the transition towards electric mobility and clean energy, Global Lithium Resources positions itself to capitalize on these trends by developing high-quality lithium deposits. The company's vision is to support the global energy transition while delivering value to its stakeholders through responsible exploration and production practices.
